content: **crocheted cloths with relief treble crochets in drops safran ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no e-323 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1 cloth measures approx 24 x 24 cm **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 70 sweet orchid 50 g colour 05 lavender 50 g colour 06 denim blue 1 cloth weighs approx 50 g crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size **crochet gauge** 24 double crochets in width and 26 row in height = 10 x 10 cm -------------------------------------------------------
